website_summaries.verdict: There's lots of feathered detail in this hand-painted globe from a top maker of globes and figurines.
pros: The 5.5-inch tall windup globe plays "The Holly and the Ivy" in pleasant, tinkly music, good for falling asleep to
The high quality of the globe makes it perfect for gift-giving anytime
cons: Some complained that the snow settled too quickly at the bottom

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Cardinal Snow Globe
customer_reviews.text: This Snow Globe is so beautiful and because I love the Cardinals so much, I just had to have it. I am so glad that I did, as it is simply beautiful in my home. Beautiful and graceful, it portrays this pretty bird in wonderful detail. It is a perfect gift to me...and I recommend this seller and product .
customer_reviews.author: Sanddee

customer_reviews.title: Very nice sculpture of red cardnial worth the money!😀
customer_reviews.text: I liked the cardnial looks life like nice red cardnial!😀
customer_reviews.author: James N.

customer_reviews.title: Super good gift
customer_reviews.text: I bought it as a gift for my friend. I love it! And now I want one for me too! It's such a good size, no bubbles inside. I think it's real glass, when you touch it - no fingerprints after! Awesome 🙂 It's a little bit heavy (only for me), but I think it should be like this! And the music, oh, I fell in love!!! By the way - its snow + sparkles inside. Highly recommended!!!
customer_reviews.author: ANNA

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: It is to be a Christmas gift and I love the quality and the sound!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Lovely, but pricey
customer_reviews.text: It made a beautiful gift for my sister, who loves cardinals, and the music was lovely. But I thought it was pricey and would buy something less expensive next time.
customer_reviews.author: auntnan

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful snow globe
customer_reviews.text: This is an absolutely beautiful snow globe. I am giving it to my mom for Christmas. She is going to love it!! Secure packing and box arrived in perfect condition.
customer_reviews.author: Meg1029

customer_reviews.title: Sentimental Gifting
customer_reviews.text: The “wooden” base is not wooden but the song it plays is beautiful and the quality is worth it! My mom actually liked it.
customer_reviews.author: Madison Leigh

customer_reviews.title: Bad
customer_reviews.text: I gave this snow globe for a birthday gift on 12/19 she opened it and the music will not play. And now I found out i cannot returned it. Purchased on 10/4/19.
customer_reviews.author: sherry

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Snow Globes
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased well made purchased two one for myself and a friend for Christmas. Also comes in nice packaging for gift giving and for storing . Detail on birds done very nice compared to some other bird snow globes I have seen.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely beautiful! This was a gift and our neighbor loved it. High quality!
customer_reviews.author: Tammy

customer_reviews.title: I love my new addition to my snow globe collection
customer_reviews.text: I love my new addition to my snow globe collection! Just love it!!! This will be an heirloom, handed down to a son in law when I'm gone...better yet I'll probably order him one for his birthday in March! Yeah, that's a great idea!!!
customer_reviews.author: Julie Ausbrook

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this as a Christmas gift for my grandmother because she loves cardinals. It’s excellent quality and absolutely beautiful. She loved it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Globe as expected and described. Works well. Would bug again.
customer_reviews.author: DncrMm

customer_reviews.title: Great gift
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a gift for someone who likes cardinals. She loved it!
customer_reviews.author: FABSCAB

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful, highly recommend.
customer_reviews.text: Soo beautiful, original plan was to gift it but I may just keep it for myself and but one more to gift.
customer_reviews.author: ella b dalagan

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: It's a very nice globe, apparently well made. It is, however, a little shy on the amount of snow.
customer_reviews.author: Traveller

customer_reviews.title: It is not the quality I expected for what I paid.
customer_reviews.text: The bird is beautifully crafted. The globe has no flaws. The music is "off quality" somewhat; but acceptable. The real issue is that the snow doesn't fall long enough and you have to reshake it several times during the song. I bought it for my grandson who found one I had and loved it, and I hoped to get him a really nice one (which this should have been for the price I paid) So, it turns out a lesser gift that what it should be.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Was a hit as a gift!
customer_reviews.text: To some, the appearance of a cardinal means they have been visited by someone who has passed on—an angel, if you will—just coming by to check on them or brighten their day. It was the perfect gift and the music box plays beautifully. The wooden base is very attractive and the globe is crystal clear so you can see the details of the cardinal very well. A great keepsake.
customer_reviews.author: CR

customer_reviews.title: Just what I wanted... I miss having cardinals here in Southern Utah
customer_reviews.text: I miss cardinals here in Southern Utah... so this is it for me... I love looking at it.
customer_reviews.author: Renate Ebsworth

customer_reviews.title: BEAUTIFUL!
customer_reviews.text: I have this to my daughter's mother in law for Christmas. She loved it. It's beautiful and playing music is a plus. You can't go wrong with this. It makes a great gift. I just might have to buy one for myself!
customer_reviews.author: carkittter

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful looking and sounding.
customer_reviews.text: It is a beautiful piece. The colors are great and the sound is very lovely to listen to. I got it for Christmas but I'm keeping it out all year.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra Holmes

customer_reviews.title: Beautifully made
customer_reviews.text: Lovely musical snow globe. Definitely higher quality than dept store ones I’ve gotten.
customer_reviews.author: Ruby Slippers

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: I love cardinals and this snow globe is just beautiful.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product. Wish it had more " snow!"
customer_reviews.text: Very nice. Bought it for my grand daughter and she loves it .
customer_reviews.author: Hamid J. Alhakeem

customer_reviews.title: It arrived in perfect condition and works beautifully
customer_reviews.text: This is a lovely musical snow globe! It arrived in perfect condition and works beautifully!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love Cardinals!
customer_reviews.text: It's nice but the snow settles too quickly so the effect doesn't last very long. But for this price that's probably fair.
customer_reviews.author: R. Adler

customer_reviews.title: Perfect gift!
customer_reviews.text: This is beautiful and the music doesn’t sound tinny at all. Perfect gift!
customer_reviews.author: Joanne

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding gift.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for a friend as a Christmas gift. She was very pleased with it.
customer_reviews.author: Gail Gabrelian

product_meta.title: The San Francisco Music Box Company Hand Crafted Cardinal Snow Globe from
product_meta.description: Cardinal Snow Globe from The San Francisco Music Box Company. Tune: “The Holly and the Ivy” 5.5”H, 18-note. Beautifully hand crafted and hand painted cardinal water globe featuring red cardinal sitting in the snow.
feature_bullets: Cardinal Snow Globe from The San Francisco Music Box Company
Inside, graceful white flakes dreamily float about when shaken.

specifications.Manufacturer: The San Francisco Music Box Company
specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.7 out of 5 stars76 ratings4.7 out of 5 stars
